title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Metacognitive and Self-Regulated Learning Strategies for Academic Achievement Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic learning habits and elementary social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can establish social studies learning plans with over 80% accuracy using metacognitive strategies (self-questioning, goal-setting, etc.).
Learners can achieve weekly learning goals at least 70% of the time by applying self-regulated learning tools (time management, motivation strategies).
Learners can periodically evaluate academic achievement via the LMS feedback system and create improvement plans at least three times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
